TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit PoppedToRootEventArgs extends Xamarin.Forms.NavigationEventArgs

Docs.summary: EventArgs for the NavigationPage's PoppedToRoot navigation event.
Docs.remarks: The passes as the event argument. This class can be cast to to allow for access to the PoppedPages collection that exposes the pages that was popped.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class Xamarin.Forms.Page page, class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<class Xamarin.Forms.Page> poppedPages) cil managed

Docs.param: For internal use by the Xamarin.Forms platform.
For internal use by the Xamarin.Forms platform.
Docs.summary: For internal use by platform renderers.
Gets a collection of pages that was removed from the navigation stack.

remarks.para: For this represents the pages that were popped. The order of the pages represents the order of the stack that was popped. The first page in the collection is the page that was closest to the root page.
